properties.title: Finsteraarhornhütte SAC
properties.abstract: Pas de réseau Natel, Sac à viande obligatoir
properties.description: Up to date high mountain cabin, embedded in a vast glacier landscape. Features pleasant multiple occupancy rooms, generous lavatories in the cabin and a magnificent sun terrace. All access trails are long and include glacier crossings: experience in high alpine hiking is mandatory. Early reservation is necessary for spring ski mountaineering tours. Small winter hut is open during the short period with no innkeeper.
